ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Interface Raster

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RasterWriter, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRaster, DoubleRaster

    public interface Raster
extends RasterWriter, Serializable
    A mutable, two-dimensional array of Colors.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPixel(int x, int y, Color pixel)
      Adds the Color to the value stored at the specified pixel.
      Color getPixel(int x, int y)
      Gets the Color stored at the specified pixel.

        clear, getHeight, getWidth, setPixel

    • Method Detail

      • getPixel

        Color getPixel(int x,
               int y)
        Gets the Color stored at the specified pixel.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the pixel.
        y - The y-coordinate of the pixel.
        Returns:
        The Color stored at the pixel.

      • addPixel

        void addPixel(int x,
              int y,
              Color pixel)
        Adds the Color to the value stored at the specified pixel.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the pixel.
        y - The y-coordinate of the pixel.
        pixel - The Color to add to the pixel.
